snippet: Work on the $5.25 billion project is expected to be finished in December 2015, despite construction setbacks.
abstract: Pres Juan Carlos Varela of Panama says major expansion of Panama Canal will be completed by beginning of 2016.
lead_paragraph: Work on the $5.25 billion project is expected to be finished in December 2015, despite construction setbacks.

headline.main: Panama Canal Expansion Ready at Start of 2016, President Says
headline.print_headline: Panama Canal Expansion Ready at Start of 2016, President Says
